content.title: ボーンマス対リバプール、プレミアリーグ2018-19：今日は何時に始まり、どのテレビチャンネルがあり、私たちの予測は何ですか？ - テレグラフ
content.desc: What is it? It's the opening match of the 16th round of Premier League fixtures - seventh-placed AFC Bournemouth host unbeaten Liverpool in second. Liverpool have won five of these sides' six league meetings but two years ago Eddie Howe's side fought back from 3-1 down with 14 minutes to play to win a thriller 4-3 at the Vitality Stadium, which will always be known as Dean Court to people of a certain age and sensible disposititions. When is it? It's today, so Saturday, December 8. What time is kick-off? 12.30pm. Newsletter Promotion - Chris Bascombe's Liverpool briefingWhat TV channel is i...

content.title: リバプールとマンチェスター・シティは、プレミアリーグにリズミカルな緊張をもたらしている。
content.desc: Already this weekend there is something of a twist to the Premier League. For the first time since early November, Liverpool will play before Manchester City, changing the dynamics that have governed the top of the table for the last month. The fact that Jurgen Klopp’s side have always been under such pressure to follow the champions with a win, to keep the gap at just two points, has been one big reason why it has felt they have been just about “hanging on” – despite having already been responsible for the seventh best record after 15 games in English history. It has just added that extra ...

content.title: ボーンマス対リバプールチームのニュース：サディオ・マヌとトレント・アレクサンダー・アーノルドは、カウルム・ウィルソンと一緒に脱退した
content.desc: Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp has dropped both Sadio Mane and Trent Alexander-Arnold from his starting line-up to face Bournemouth in Saturday’s early kick-off, while the hosts will be without their leading goalscorer this season with Callum Wilson absent through injury. LIVE: BOURNEMOUTH VS LIVERPOOL Bournemouth make three changes to the side that beat Huddersfield in mid-week, both of which have been forced on manager Eddie Howe. Midfielder Lewis Cook is replaced by Andrew Surman after he ruptured his anterior cruciate ligament, ending his season in the process and ruling him out for the...

content.title: ボーンマスvsリバプールライブ - 何時からスタートするのか、テレビチャンネル、チームニュース、オッズおよび予測 - 独立
content.desc: Liverpool have the opportunity to leapfrog Manchester City and go top of the table for a few hours at least when they meet seventh-placed Bournemouth. The Reds are yet to taste league defeat this season and will be confident of a win which could would them to the summit of the Premier League before Pep Guardiola’s side face a difficult task at Chelsea. Bournemouth however ended a run of four straight defeats in a 2-1 win over Huddersfield in midweek, with in-form Callum Wilson notching his eighth of the season. Follow the live action below. What time does it start? Bournemouth vs Liverpool ...

content.title: ボーンマス対リバプール、プレミアリーグ：ライブスコアと最新のアップデート - テレグラフ
content.desc: 1:00PM30 mins Bournemouth have responded well. Stanislas and Daniels combine well down the left, but the former's cross is poor and the move breaks down. 12:58PMGOOOAAAAL!! Bournemouth 0 Liverpool 1 (Salah)! Begovic is at fault here... and so is the linesman! Firmino volleys a hugely ambitious left-footed effort at goal, and it looks like a simple enough save for Begovic, who should really palm it out of harm's way. He only succeeds in swatting it straight out in front of his goal, though, and Salah - who replays show was clearly offside - follows up to score from eight yards. The Egyptian ...

content.title: プレミアリーグのベット：マンチェスター・シティがチェルシーに苦痛を与える
content.desc: After you have lost your unbeaten record with a disappointing performance against one of your huge rivals and suffered another defeat on the road against Wolves after letting a lead slip, the last team you want rolling into town is Manchester City. Maurizio Sarri’s decision to rest Jorginho, Mateo Kovacic, David Luiz and Pedro failed to pay off against Wolves but his side were still unlucky to lose 2-1, given their opponents scored with their only two shots on target. Chelsea are unbeaten at home this season but have drawn three of their eight matches at Stamford Bridge against Liverpool, M...

content.desc: Alexandre Lacazette Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang was very much the flavour of the week, seeing more price rises than points, and remains an excellent choice ahead of this weekend's meeting with Huddersfield Town. At £1.6m cheaper, however, Alexandre Lacazette should not be ignored, especially if he is restored to the starting line-up for Arsenal's forthcoming run of favourable fixtures. Lacazette scored in the north London derby and was a shade unlucky not to be awarded Marcos Rojo's goal at Old Trafford on Wednesday night. Lukasz Fabianski Even with just one clean sheet in his last nine outin...

content.title: マンチェスターはアテネにとってスターリングで賭けるかもしれないが、「ヨーロッパでは禁止されない」 - ガーディアン
content.desc: Manchester City travel to Chelsea not yet ready to risk Sergio Agüero as he recovers from an abductor muscle strain and with Pep Guardiola weighing up the pros and cons of using Raheem Sterling in a more central role. Related: Chelsea v Manchester City: match preview The City manager would not reveal his intended lineup but has three in-form wingers in Sterling, Riyad Mahrez and Leroy Sané, while Gabriel Jesus has so far failed to make the most of Agüero’s absence. “Raheem can play in many positions,” Guardiola said. “I prefer him on the wing but he did not always play there for Liverpool.”...

content.title: リバプールは「狂った」週の準備として守備怪我を負う
content.desc: Liverpool start what Jurgen Klopp, their manager, believes is a “crazy” week of games with a minor defensive crisis ahead of Saturday’s lunchtime trip to Bournemouth. Victory would take Klopp’s side to the top of the Premier League, for a few hours at least, but they will have to do it with just two recognised centre-backs available – Virgil van Dijk and Joel Matip. Joe Gomez will miss around six weeks after suffering a break in his lower left leg in the victory at Burnley in midweek. Klopp revealed that his natural replacement, Dejan Lovren, was unavailable due to concussion. Klopp is hopi...

content.title: ホセ・ムーリーニョはマンチェスター・ユナイテッドがリーグに再び勝たなければならない場合、マンチェスター・ユナイテッドがマンチェスター・ユナイテッドを奪うのを支援するよう、
content.desc: Jose Mourinho has claimed that Manchester United may need authorities to crack down on Manchester City’s spending before they can hope to challenge their rivals for the Premier League title again. Uefa last month opened an investigation into allegations, published in the German magazine Der Spiegel, that City illegitimately circumvented Financial Fair Play (FFP) regulations. Mourinho has regularly complained that United cannot match City’s clout in the transfer market since his arrival in Manchester and pointed to City’s spending power as a reason why United struggle to compete with their n...

content.title: リバプールとマンチェスター・シティが異なる時代にプレーするとき、ユルゲン・クロップがなぜ難しいのかを説明します。
content.desc: This time it is Liverpool who will get the chance to strike first. Jurgen Klopp's side travelled to Burnley in midweek knowing that Manchester City had stretched their lead at the top of the Premier League table to five points 24 hours earlier. Klopp's men managed to respond, a come from behind victory at Turf Moor confirming this as Liverpool's best ever start to a league season. A trip to Bournemouth for Saturday's lunchtime kick-off means it is the Reds who can apply the pressure this time, possibly taking top spot in the Premier League, with Pep Guardiola's men facing a potentially diff...
